titleStmt.title: Loves school, or, A new merry book of complements being the language of love fitted to the humours of all sorts, sexes and conditions : made up of curious and pleasant dialogues and discourses, eloquent and delicious letters, songs, and sonnets, with many other fine fantacies and pretty conceits.

Loves school, or, A new merry book of complements being the language of love fitted to the humours of all sorts, sexes and conditions : made up of curious and pleasant dialogues and discourses, eloquent and delicious letters, songs, and sonnets, with many other fine fantacies and pretty conceits.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
